thread.section_title: South Florida Personal Finance News - Sun Sentinel
thread.title: Power Financial listed among best credit unions to work for
thread.title_full: Power Financial listed among best credit unions to work for - Sun Sentinel

author: Donna Gehrke-White
title: Power Financial listed among best credit unions to work for
text:
Power Financial Credit Union, headquartered in Pembroke Pines, was named one of the best credit unions in the country to work for.
It's the second consecutive year Power Financial was named to Credit Union Journal's list. The credit union was ranked 12th on the list of the nation's credit unions with assets between $500 million and $1 billion.
The list includes 45 institutions out of more than 6,500 credit unions nationwide. No other credit union in South Florida made the list.
To come up the list, the magazine evaluates each credit union's workplace policies, practices and demographics and then surveys employees.
"Receiving this honor every year it has been awarded is a strong endorsement of the family-focused culture that has been an integral component of Power Financial Credit Union's guiding principles for more than 65 years," said President and CEO Allan M. Prindle.
dgehrke@tribpub.com
